name: Astro Flux
description:
Beginners Circle Jam #3 

This is our entry for the "Beginners Circle Jam #3" hosted by angrysmile; the theme was Another Planet. This is my first game's jam and also the first time I've used Unity; I decided to learn once the games jam started rather than beforehand which made it challenging, but extremely fun and I have learned a lot. 

********************************************************************************

Astro Flux is a 2D top-down adventure game about an astronaut who's daughter goes missing one day when she gets abducted by aliens. You play as the astronaut and must venture through space battling dangerous enemies whilst collecting coins for upgrades that you can get in the planets that you come across. Can you defeat the final boss and save your daughter Lisa?

********************************************************************************

I worked in a group of 3 consisting of two coders and one artist.

Coder - ;paperclíp.

Coder - misterpicklez

Artist - sei
